00019 const Uint16 MAX_JUMPHEIGHT = 30;
00020 const Uint16 MIN_JUMPHEIGHT = 10;
00021 
00022 CPlayerLevel::CPlayerLevel(CMap *pmap, Uint32 x, Uint32 y,
00023       std::vector<CObject*>& ObjectPtrs, direction_t facedir) :
00024 CObject(pmap, x, y, OBJ_NONE),
00025 m_animation(0),
00026 m_animation_time(1),
00027 m_animation_ticker(0),
00028 m_ObjectPtrs(ObjectPtrs),
00029 m_climbing(false)
00030 {
00031  m_index = 0;
00032  m_direction = facedir;
00033  m_ActionBaseOffset = 0x98C;
00034  setActionForce(A_KEEN_STAND);
00035 
00036  memset(m_playcontrol, 0,PA_MAX_ACTIONS);
00037 
00038  m_pfiring = false;
00039  m_jumpheight = 0;
00040 
00041  processActionRoutine();
00042  CSprite &rSprite = g_pGfxEngine->getSprite(sprite);
00043  moveUp(rSprite.m_bboxY2-rSprite.m_bboxY1+(1<<CSF));
00044  performCollisions();
00045 }
00046 
00047 void CPlayerLevel::process()
00048 {
00049  // Perform animation cycle
00050  if(m_animation_ticker >= m_animation_time)
00051  {
00052   m_animation++;
00053   m_animation_ticker = 0;
00054  }
00055  else m_animation_ticker++;
00056 
00057  processInput();
00058 
00059  performCollisionsSameBox();
00060 
00061  processMoving();
00062 
00063  processJumping();
00064 
00065  if(!m_climbing)
00066   processLooking();
00067 
00068  processFiring();
00069 
00070  processFalling();
00071 
00072  processExiting();
00073 
00074  moveXDir(xinertia);
00075  xinertia = 0;
00076 
00077  processActionRoutine();
00078 }

00080 void CPlayerLevel::processInput()
00081 {
00082  m_playcontrol[PA_X] = 0;
00083  m_playcontrol[PA_Y] = 0;
00084 
00085  if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_LEFT))
00086   m_playcontrol[PA_X] -= 100;
00087  if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_RIGHT))
00088   m_playcontrol[PA_X] += 100;
00089 
00090  if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_UP))
00091   m_playcontrol[PA_Y] -= 100;
00092  if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_DOWN))
00093   m_playcontrol[PA_Y] += 100;
00094 
00095  if(!m_pfiring)
00096  {
00097   if(g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_JUMP))
00098   {
00099    m_playcontrol[PA_JUMP]++;
00100    if(m_jumpheight >= (MAX_JUMPHEIGHT-2))
00101    {
00102     m_playcontrol[PA_JUMP] = 0;
00103     g_pInput->flushCommand(m_index, IC_JUMP);
00104    }
00105   }
00106   else
00107    m_playcontrol[PA_JUMP] = 0;
00108 
00109   m_playcontrol[PA_POGO]   = g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_POGO) ? 1 : 0;
00110  }
00111 
00112  m_playcontrol[PA_FIRE]   = g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_FIRE)   ? 1 : 0;
00113  m_playcontrol[PA_STATUS] = g_pInput->getHoldedCommand(m_index, IC_STATUS) ? 1 : 0;
00114 
00115  if(g_pInput->getTwoButtonFiring(m_index))
00116  {
00117   if(m_playcontrol[PA_FIRE])
00118   {
00119    m_playcontrol[PA_FIRE] = 0;
00120   }
00121   else if(m_playcontrol[PA_JUMP] && m_playcontrol[PA_POGO])
00122   {
00123    m_playcontrol[PA_FIRE] = 1;
00124    m_playcontrol[PA_JUMP] = 0;
00125    m_playcontrol[PA_POGO] = 0;
00126   }
00127  }
00128 }

00130 void CPlayerLevel::processFiring()
00131 {
00132  bool inair = getActionNumber(A_KEEN_JUMP) || getActionNumber(A_KEEN_JUMP+1) ||
00133    getActionNumber(A_KEEN_FALL) || falling;
00134 
00135  bool shooting =  getActionNumber(A_KEEN_JUMP_SHOOT) || getActionNumber(A_KEEN_JUMP_SHOOTDOWN) ||
00136    getActionNumber(A_KEEN_JUMP_SHOOTUP) || getActionNumber(A_KEEN_SHOOT+2);
00137 
00138  if( m_playcontrol[PA_FIRE] && !shooting )
00139  {
00140   if( inair )
00141   {
00142    if(m_playcontrol[PA_Y] < 0)
00143     setAction(A_KEEN_JUMP_SHOOTUP);
00144    else if(m_playcontrol[PA_Y] > 0)
00145     setAction(A_KEEN_JUMP_SHOOTDOWN);
00146    else
00147     setAction(A_KEEN_JUMP_SHOOT);
00148   }
00149   else
00150   {
00151    if(m_playcontrol[PA_Y] < 0)
00152     setAction(A_KEEN_SHOOT+2);
00153    else
00154     setAction(A_KEEN_SHOOT);
00155   }
00156  }
00157 
00158 
00159 
00160 }
00161 
00162 void CPlayerLevel::processFalling()
00163 {
00164  if(m_climbing) return;
00165 
00166  CObject::processFalling();
00167 
00168  if( falling && !getActionNumber(A_KEEN_JUMP_SHOOT)
00169    && !getActionNumber(A_KEEN_JUMP_SHOOTUP) && !getActionNumber(A_KEEN_JUMP_SHOOTDOWN) )
00170   setAction(A_KEEN_FALL);
00171 }
00172 
00173 void CPlayerLevel::processMoving()
00174 {
00175  size_t movespeed = 50;
00176 
00177  // Normal moving
00178  if(!m_playcontrol[PA_FIRE])
00179  {
00180   if( m_playcontrol[PA_X]<0 && !blockedl)
00181   {
00182    xinertia = -movespeed;
00183    m_direction = LEFT;
00184   }
00185   else if( m_playcontrol[PA_X]>0 && !blockedr)
00186   {
00187    xinertia = movespeed;
00188    m_direction = RIGHT;
00189   }
00190 
00191   // Now check if Player has the chance to climb a pole or something similar
00192   if(hitdetectWithTileProperty(1)) // 1 -> stands for pole Property
00193   {
00194    // Hit pole!
00195    // TODO: This code does not work yet correctly for some reason
00196    if( !m_climbing && m_playcontrol[PA_Y] != 0 )
00197    {
00198     m_climbing = true;
00199    }
00200    else if(m_climbing)
00201    {
00202     if(m_playcontrol[PA_Y] < 0)
00203     {
00204      if(!getActionNumber(A_KEEN_POLE_CLIMB))
00205       setAction(A_KEEN_POLE_CLIMB);
00206      //yinertia = -1;
00207     }
00208     else if(m_playcontrol[PA_Y] > 0)
00209     {
00210      //setAction(A_KEEN_POLE_SLIDE);
00211      //yinertia = 1;
00212     }
00213    }
00214   }
00215   else
00216   {
00217    m_climbing = false;
00218   }
00219 
00220  }
00221 
00222  if( blockedd )
00223  {
00224   if(xinertia != 0)
00225    setAction(A_KEEN_RUN);
00226   else if(m_playcontrol[PA_Y] == 0)
00227    setAction(A_KEEN_STAND);
00228  }
00229 }
00230 
00231 // Processes the jumping of the player
00232 void CPlayerLevel::processJumping()
00233 {
00234  if(!getActionNumber(A_KEEN_JUMP))
00235  {
00236   if(blockedd)
00237    m_jumpheight = 0;
00238 
00239   // Not jumping? Let's see if we can prepare the player to do so
00240   if(m_playcontrol[PA_JUMP] && (getActionNumber(A_KEEN_STAND) or getActionNumber(A_KEEN_RUN)) )
00241   {
00242    yinertia = -136;
00243    setAction(A_KEEN_JUMP);
00244    m_climbing = false;
00245   }
00246  }
00247  else
00248  {
00249   // while button is pressed, make the player jump higher
00250   if(m_playcontrol[PA_JUMP] || m_jumpheight <= MIN_JUMPHEIGHT)
00251    m_jumpheight++;
00252   else
00253    m_jumpheight = 0;
00254 
00255   // Set another jump animation if Keen is near yinertia == 0
00256   if( yinertia > -10 )
00257    setAction(A_KEEN_JUMP+1);
00258 
00259   // If the max. height is reached or the player cancels the jump by release the button
00260   // make keen fall
00261   if( m_jumpheight == 0 || m_jumpheight >= MAX_JUMPHEIGHT )
00262   {
00263    yinertia = 0;
00264    m_jumpheight = 0;
00265   }
00266 
00267  }
00268 }
00269 
00270 // This is for processing the looking routine.
00271 void CPlayerLevel::processLooking()
00272 {
00273  // Looking Up and Down Routine
00274  //bool notshooting = ;
00275  if(blockedd && xinertia == 0 /*&& notshooting*/)
00276  {
00277   if( m_playcontrol[PA_Y]<0 )
00278    setAction(A_KEEN_LOOKUP);
00279   else if( m_playcontrol[PA_Y]>0 )
00280    setAction(A_KEEN_LOOKDOWN);
00281   //else
00282    //setAction(A_KEEN_STAND);
00283  }
00284 }

00286 // Processes the exiting of the player. Here all cases are held
00287 void CPlayerLevel::processExiting()
00288 {
00289  CEventContainer& EventContainer = g_pBehaviorEngine->m_EventList;
00290 
00291  Uint32 x = getXMidPos();
00292  if( ((mp_Map->m_width-2)<<CSF) < x || (2<<CSF) > x )
00293  {
00294   EventContainer.add( new EventExitLevel(mp_Map->getLevel()) );
00295  }
00296 }
